title: Managing Drug-Induced Movement Disorders
itunes:title: Managing Drug-Induced Movement Disorders
description:
A practical discussion on akathisia, extrapyramidal symptoms (EPS), tardive syndromes, and acute dystonia.

Guest: Gregory Pontone, M.D. 
Interviewer: Mohan Gautam, D.O.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Drug-Induced Movement Disorders: The Clinical Essentials - Interview with Gregory Pontone, M.D.
